welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wendeburg, Germany! This charming town is known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Wendeburg has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Braunschweig Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'BWE Free WiFi' in their device's network settings.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
